mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer, reg_date, update_date, member_id, category) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{regDate}, #{updateDate}, #{memberId}, #{category})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{updateParam.title}, writer=#{updateParam.writer}, content=#{updateParam.content}, update_date=#{updateParam.updateDate}, category=#{updateParam.category} where id = #{id}
